title: Ambient Sounds
description: Sets the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

asset.title: Asset
asset.description: Name of the sound asset to play

chance.title: Chance
chance.description: Probability of the sound playing each interval, between 0.0 and 1.0

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position.

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome.

mood.title: Mood
mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low.

underwater_addition.title: Underwater Addition
underwater_addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position when underwater.

underwater_loop.title: Underwater Loop
underwater_loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome and underwater.

underwater_mood.title: Underwater Mood
underwater_mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby water block position when the light level is low.
